title: 2Pac Makaveli Original 7 Day Theory CEO.rar
description:
Track List (Sperated in 256kb Mp3)

01. Intro/Bomb First (My Second Reply)
02. Hail Mary
03. Me and My Girlfriend
04. Lost Souls
05. To Live & Die in L.A.
06. Against All Odds
07. Life of an Outlaw
08. Friends
09. Blasphemy

Hey 2pac Makaveli fans this is the ORIGINAL 7 DAY THEORY the way 2Pac wanted it recorded 
the only problem is the source is from a very badly scratched recording so I did my best
to restore it but its definetly not perfect Lost Souls is probably the the most damaged but
all can be listened to without any cracks and only a few skips and its probably about FM radio
quality so enjoy and I hope a better quality version of this floats somewhere till then I guess
we can all put up with this

2014 Resurrection?
